title: World Pack List
description: The world_behavior_packs.json and world_resource_packs.json files define which add-on packs are active for a world. Located in the root of a world folder.

tokens.text: defines active packs for this world

fields.title: Packs
fields.description: An array of pack registrations defining which packs are active.

subForm.title: Pack Registration
subForm.description: A reference to an add-on pack by UUID and version.

fields.title: Pack ID
fields.description: The UUID of the pack from its manifest.json header.uuid field.

fields.title: Version
fields.description: The version of the pack as an array of three integers [major, minor, patch].

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: Optional priority for pack loading order. Lower values load first.

note: This file is a JSON array at the root level. Each element is a pack registration with pack_id (UUID) and version (array of integers). The world_behavior_packs.json file lists behavior packs, while world_resource_packs.json lists resource packs.
